changeSet.comment: the details table of 'Terra DataRepo' source
changeSet.sql: CREATE TYPE TerraDataRepoSourceDetails AS ( id bigint, -- unique to this table start_time timestamptz, -- start timestamp of the TDR data query interval end_time timestamptz, -- end timestamp of the TDR data query interval datarepo_row_ids text[], -- array of datarepo row ids for snapshot creation snapshot_creation_job_id text, -- id of the TDR snapshot creation job snapshot_id text -- id of the snapshot lives in TDR )
